hasDitaContent.@value: Both buprenorphine and trazodone can have CNS depressant effects, which might affect the ability to perform skilled tasks (see 'Drugs and Driving' in Guidance on Prescribing).

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  buprenorphine  and  trazodone  can have CNS depressant effects, which might affect the ability to perform skilled tasks (see 'Drugs and Driving' in  Guidance on Prescribing ).

hasDitaContent.@value: Verapamil is predicted to increase the exposure to buprenorphine. Manufacturer advises monitor and adjust dose.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Verapamil   is predicted to   increase   the exposure to   buprenorphine .  Manufacturer advises monitor and adjust dose .
